text: Margaret "Talli" Tallichet (March 13, 1914 - May 3, 1991) was an American actress. She was the wife of movie director William Wyler. Her best-known leading role was with Peter Lorre in the noir movie Stranger on the Third Floor (1940). Tallichet died at her home in Los Angeles on May 3, 1991 from cancer, aged 77.Obituary, Margaret Tallichet Wyler, New York Times, May 7, 1991. ==References== Category:1914 births Category:1991 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Los Angeles Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from Dallas
title: Margaret Tallichet
